alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Clay; Jackson; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:57PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Owsley, east central Jackson, southwestern Breathitt, southeastern Lee and north central Clay Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Island City, or 9 miles southwest of Booneville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Major, Scoville, Newfound and Levi around 205 PM EDT. Booneville, Ricetown, Southfork, Gobbard, Eversole, Chestnut Gap, Sebastian, Turin and Lucky Fork around 210 PM EDT. Cowcreek, Arnett, Lerose, Morris Fork, Stay, Valjean and Grass around 215 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Houston, Jetts Creek, Crockettsville, Lone, Dalesburg, Athol, Turkey, Sebastian`s Branch, Copebranch and Talbert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
